titleStmt.title: The magistrates dignity and duty. Being a sermon preached on Octob. 30. 1653. at Pauls Church before the Right Honourable, Thomas Viner, Lord Major, and the aldermen of the city of London. Being the first sermon after his entrance into his majoralty. By William Spurstowe, D.D. minister of Gods Word at Hackney neere London.
titleStmt.author: Spurstowe, William, 1605?-1666.

titleStmt.title: The magistrates dignity and duty. Being a sermon preached on Octob. 30. 1653. at Pauls Church before the Right Honourable, Thomas Viner, Lord Major, and the aldermen of the city of London. Being the first sermon after his entrance into his majoralty. By William Spurstowe, D.D. minister of Gods Word at Hackney neere London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for J. Rothwell, at the Fountain and Beare in Goldsmiths-row in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 24. 1653"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
